Text:
Will be seeding between 4.30 am to 6.30 pm(duration may vary) according to GMT,everyday. Until atleast 4-5 seeders are available. Happy Leeching.

And please seed.

ultra low size is good, but the quality is not even near to the real 720p or 1080p rips.

Just increase the bitrate a little bit, 2-pass encoding, use L5[level 5] MKV compression, 
my estimated file size of this torrent would be 110-140mb.

hope you change it in your future releases,
because Tron Uprising is fluid based animation, so quality must be preserved.

ThankYou again!!
